body.name: Melissa & Doug Mine to Love Twins Luke & Lucy 15” Light Skin-Tone Boy and Girl Baby Dolls with Rompers, Caps, Pacifiers - First Baby Dolls For Toddlers 18 Months And Up

features: YOURS TO LOVE: It's twice the fun with twin 15-inch dolls Luke and Lucy
HUGS ALL DAY: Luke and Lucy have adorable coordinating removable rompers and caps, eyes that open and close, and they can suck their thumbs or the included pacifiers.

PLAY AND LEARN: This set of twins makes the perfect first dolls for nurturing and cuddling and for developing social and emotional skills.this product ships in its own special e-commerce packaging intended to be easier to open and reduce waste (curbside recyclable)

GREAT GIFT FOR AGES 18 MONTHS TO 5 YEARS: These lovable twin dolls make an exceptional gift for kids ages 18 months to 5 years. Add the Melissa and Doug Mine to Love - Mariana 12" Baby Doll to round out the hands-on, screen-free play experience.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa and Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”
body.description: Melissa & Doug Mine to Love Twins Luke & Lucy 12” Baby Dolls (Frustration-Free Packaging)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Countless Ways to Play From classic wooden toys to realistic pretend play sets, Melissa & Doug products spark imagination and wonder through screen-free, open-ended play! We make well-crafted toys that are developed with care to be passed down from generation to generation or shared family to family. When kids pretend with Melissa & Doug, anything is possible!

With more than three decades of experience, we’re a brand you can trust. Our safe and durable toys inspire imaginative play and are designed to stand the test of time and be passed down through generations. We care about sustainability and use wood whenever we can because it’s renewable and durable. To ensure the world has healthy forests AND high-quality wooden toys, we’ve committed to planting 10 million trees by 2030. 100% Screen-Free No screens, no apps, just good wholesome toys for hours of kid-powered fun! Each one of our products is designed to engage children in the joy of imaginative, hands-on play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for a gift, cute, soft, good price
reviews.reviewText: This is on condition on arrival only as it’s now set aside to gift.The two dolls were each in a plastic bag, the bags inside a Melissa and Doug box. I opened them, removed the clothing, and the dolls have every appearance of being new, no marks anywhere, clean, eyes working, no odor. The size is just right, and the bodies are soft. These are for a one-year-old who hugs all her toys. They can only be wiped clean, but I knew that when I bought them. One has brown eyes, the other blue. Really cute dolls, very pleased with the purchase, looking forward to gifting them. Please note that I cannot speak to durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 year old Granddaughter Loves Playing with Them Perfect Size
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Melissa & Doug Mine to Love Twins Luke & Lucy 15” Boy and Girl Baby Dolls, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The quality of these dolls is outstanding – they are well-made, durable, and simply adorable. Melissa & Doug consistently delivers on craftsmanship, and these twins are no exception. From the attention to detail to their charming expressions, these dolls have quickly become a favorite for my 3-year-old granddaughter, who absolutely loves them. If you're in the market for high-quality, delightful baby dolls, Luke and Lucy are a fantastic investment that brings joy and playfulness to any child's collection

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two for the price of one!
reviews.reviewText: These two dolls are adorable. Melissa and Doug once again provide you with a well made product. My granddaughter who's just 18 months loves them as does her older brother who is 3. They play all the time with them and are practicing for a new baby coming soon to their home. The only thing I was a little disappointed with was they came in a plain brown box. I ended up buying a pretty box for this Christmas present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable twin dolls!
reviews.reviewText: Our granddaughters loved these dolls they were the perfect size, pretty faces, soft, and had nice clothes on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These twins are cute. Good size & weight for a 2 yr old. The eyes open & close. My 2 yr old daughter loves them. The only complaint is the pacifier that comes with the doll is really hard to push into the doll mouth…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter absolutely loves these dolls! They are super cute and light weight! I got them on sale but they are totally worth the normal price as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size dolls for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my granddaughter & was really happy they came as a girl/boy twin set. My grandson is barely 2 years older than her, & they both want to play with each other's toys. This twin set made it easy to share. They seemed well made & were definitely huggable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby doll twins
reviews.reviewText: This is a real cute set of baby dolls. Perfect for kids who love babies to have and to hold.
